DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine how safe and effective allantoin 3% cream (Alwextin) is in improving the healing of recurrent skin lesions and reducing overall blistering in people with epidermolysis bullosa (EB). Allantoin 3% cream is applied topically to the entire body once daily.
DOC.brief_title: Study of AlwextinÂ® Cream in Treating Epidermolysis Bullosa
DOC.detailed_description: Potential subjects came to the for a screening visit. Eligible subjects had baseline assessments performed and were provided study medication, allantoin 3% cream. Subjects were instructed to apply the study medication to the entire body once daily and to keep daily record of study medication use. Subjects returned every 4 weeks for a total of 12 weeks for repeat assessments.
DOC.criteria: history of epidermolysis bullosa use of any skin product containing allantoin for 30 days prior to enrollment
